explains: n. （从建筑物，住房，车库等通往大路的）私人车道

sentences.en: He pulled into the driveway in front of her garage.
sentences.cn: 他把车开进她家车库前的车道上停在那里。

sentences.en: You can't park here, you're obstructing my driveway.
sentences.cn: 你不能在这里停车，你挡住了我家的车道。

sentences.en: I stood in the driveway and watched him back out and pull away.
sentences.cn: 我站在车道上，看他把车倒出来然后开走了。
